description: PDF Viewer with Annotation capabilities using EmbedPDF and React

features.description: PDF loads and displays from remote URL
steps: Wait for the PDF engine to finish loading (loading message should disappear)
Verify PDF content is visible on screen
Verify at least one page of the PDF is rendered

features.description: PDF pages can be scrolled vertically
steps: Scroll down in the PDF viewport
Verify the view has scrolled and different content is visible
Check how many pages/canvases are rendered
Verify multiple pages exist in the document
Look for the annotation toolbar at the top of the page
Verify the toolbar contains buttons for: Highlight, Pen, Square, Circle, Text, Delete

features.description: Tool buttons show selected state when clicked
steps: Verify the button visually shows it is selected (different styling)
Verify Pen is now selected and Highlight is no longer selected

features.description: Delete button is disabled when nothing selected
steps: Look at the Delete button without selecting any annotation
Verify Delete button appears disabled or grayed out
Verify toolbar has white background, rounded corners, and shadow

features.description: PDF pages have shadow effect for depth
steps: Look at the PDF page rendering
Verify pages have a subtle shadow around them
Look at the area around the PDF pages
Verify the background is a light gray color
Click the Highlight button in the toolbar
Verify the tool is now active (button shows selected state)
Click the Pen button in the toolbar
Verify the tool is now active
Click the Square button in the toolbar
Verify the tool is now active
Click the Circle button in the toolbar
Verify the tool is now active

features.description: Text annotation tool can be activated
steps: Click the Text button in the toolbar
Verify the tool is now active

features.description: Can create a highlight annotation on text
steps: Select some text in the PDF by clicking and dragging
Verify a yellow highlight appears over the selected text

features.description: Can draw freehand with Pen tool
steps: Click and drag on the PDF to draw a line
Verify an ink stroke appears where you drew
Click and drag on the PDF to create a rectangle
Click and drag on the PDF to create an ellipse
Load the PDF viewer with an existing annotation (or create one)
Verify the annotation shows selection handles or highlight
Select the annotation by clicking it
Verify the annotation is removed from the page

features.description: Can switch between different annotation tools
steps: Click Highlight tool, verify it's selected
Click Pen tool, verify it's now selected and Highlight is not
Click Square tool, verify it's now selected
Confirm only one tool is active at a time
Create an annotation on the visible page
Scroll back to the original page
Verify the annotation is still there

features.description: Can create multiple annotations of different types
steps: Verify all three annotations are visible at the same time
Check console for any JavaScript errors
